# Iris plot

## Sepal length for **setosa**, **versicolor** and **virginica**

```{r iris plot, echo=TRUE}

iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(Species, Sepal.Length)) +
  geom_violin(aes(fill=Species), color = "transparent") +
  geom_jitter(alpha=.2) +
  theme_bw()
```
